panel__settings__polling__subheader.message: Periodically polls the DiskStation to fetch tasks.

panel__settings__polling__popup_subheade.message: Enables or disables polling when the popup is open.

panel__settings__polling__background_sub.message: Enables or disables polling when the popup is open.
Note that background polling is necessary for notification and icon count.

panel__settings__polling__interval_subhe.message: Changes the polling interval for ask fetching.
